extends java.lang.Object
    This program demonstrates static methods

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • printMenu

        public static void printMenu()
        This method asks the user which calculator they want to use. It requires nothing to operate but it needs the different calculators to not confuse the user.

      • circleArea

        public static double circleArea​(double radius)
        This method calculates the area of a circle. It requires the radius so it can compute and then return the area.
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius of the circle
        Returns:
        It returns the computed area of the given circle

      • rectangleArea

        public static double rectangleArea​(double length,
                                   double width)
        This method calculates the area of a rectangle. It requires the length and width so it can compute and then return the area.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the rectangle
        width - the width of the rectangle
        Returns:
        It returns the computed area of the given rectangle

      • triangleArea

        public static double triangleArea​(double base,
                                  double height)
        This method calculates the area of a triangle. It requires the base and height so it can compute and then return the area.
        Parameters:
        base - the base of the triangle
        height - the height of the triangle
        Returns:
        It returns the computed area of the given triangle

      • circleCircumference

        public static double circleCircumference​(double radius)
        This method calculates the circumference of a circle. It requires the radius so it can compute and then return the circumference.
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius of the circle
        Returns:
        It returns the computed circumference of the given circle

      • rectanglePerimeter

        public static double rectanglePerimeter​(double length,
                                        double width)
        This method calculates the perimeter of a rectangle. It requires the length and width so it can compute and then return the perimeter.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the rectangle
        width - the width of the rectangle
        Returns:
        It returns the computed perimeter of the given rectangle

      • trianglePerimeter

        public static double trianglePerimeter​(double base,
                                       double height,
                                       double hypotenuse)
        This method calculates the perimeter of a triangle. It requires the base, height and hypotenuse so it can compute and then return the perimeter.
        Parameters:
        base - the base of the triangle(any side works as long as each one is unique)
        height - the height of the triangle(any side works as long as each one is unique)
        hypotenuse - the hypotenuse of the triangle(any side works as long as each one is unique)
        Returns:
        It returns the computed perimeter of the given triangle
